translations: v.使敬畏；使惊叹（awe 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: We obviously knew oneself is awing angel only has supports can soar.
sentences.translation: 我们明明知道自己是一只翅膀的天使只有相拥着才能飞翔。

sentences.sentence: We will receive the confirm and reward of them only after moving them heartily and be stronger only by awing the customers and trying to creat more value for them.
sentences.translation: 只有在客户价值面前永远敬畏，努力为客户创造价值，我们才能够强大。

sentences.sentence: Martin drank on silently, biting out his orders and invitations and awing the barkeeper, an effeminate country youngster with watery blue eyes and hair parted in the middle.
sentences.translation: 那老板是个带女人气的乡下小伙子，水汪汪的蓝眼睛，头发从正中分开。
